home.text1:
Comprehensive data on weather, climate and air quality in cities are unfortunately still available to a limited extent. Within the framework of the BMBF programme Module B we will therefore process already available data and collect new or missing data by means of long-term measurements, intensive measurement campaigns and physical modelling. In order to support the exchange of observation and model data between the project partners beyond the module boundaries to Module A and C, e.g. for the validation of the newly developed urban climate model PALM-4U or for urban climatological and scientific studies, this data management system (DMS) was developed within the research programme.
 If you have and account you can upload data that meets the requirements, via the respective page. If not logged in, you can see and download data that is published under open licences. Please refer to the data standard and data policy, linked above, for more information.
home.text2: The use of a uniform data format as well as binding conventions for the use of data and metadata is an essential prerequisite for their effective and efficient administration in the DMS. In addition, a uniform data standard also enables the development and provision of innovative tools for the analysis and visualization of complex and very heterogeneous data. After completion of the programme, data will be made available to the public under the [UC]² Research Licence and the [UC]² Open Licence.
home.caption: Data management system outline of the BMBF programme Urban climate under Change [UC]2. Data flow depends on the assigned data policy. Reprinted from Scherer et al., 2019

upload.info_text:
Below you can upload one or more file(s) to the [UC²] Data Management System.
On upload, a data conformity check will be run, to verify the file meets the requirements.
The results of the test and the status of your upload will be displayed below.
upload.format_note:
Please note: At the moment we accept only netCDF files meeting the [UC²] %{link} requirements.
In the future we will also accept other data.
upload.title: Upload
upload.droparea: Drag one or more file(s) here</br>or click to browse

login_info.text: You are not logged in. You are only shown data released under public licences. To see additional data, please log in. Don't have an account yet? Register.

search.info_text:
Type in your search keywords below. The data base will search for it in most of the meta information available.
You can also filter by a specific institution, site or variable.
Use toggle options to include files marked as old (not the most recent version of the file) or invalid.
Colored results mark erroneous files or files that contain warnings.
If logged in, you can also filter for the files you uploaded using the respective toggle option.
search.title: Search

register.title: Register
register.success_message: Anmeldeformular wurde gesendet. Der Antrag wird bearbeitet und Sie erhalten eine E-Mail bei Statusänderung.

footer.system: Data Management System [UC²] - BMBF Programme Urban Climate Under Change
